message_1:
What is the median of the following data set?

36, 25, 18, 22, 41, 34, 26, 28, 19, 31, 23, 17, 39. 

(Note: The median is a measure of central tendency in statistics and is the middle value when the data is arranged in order. If there are an even number of data points, then the median is the average of the two middle values.)
message_2:
First, we need to arrange the data set in ascending order:

17, 18, 19, 22, 23, 25, 26, 28, 31, 34, 36, 39, 41

Since there are 13 data points (an odd number), the median will be the middle value. In this case, the median is the 7th value:

17, 18, 19, 22, 23, 25, (26), 28, 31, 34, 36, 39, 41

So, the median of this data set is 26.
